description:
After Kanade rejects his confession of love, Shikijou presses her for a reason, grabbing her arm and saying, "This isn`t normal. This isn`t like you." Kanade throws him by reflex, then Shikijou flies into a rage and turns a stun gun on her!
When Kanade slowly regains consciousness, she finds herself in a dimly lit abandoned warehouse where a group of delinquents are chatting and laughing. Kanade`s hands and feet are tied with rope, so she can`t move. Shikijou moves closer to her saying, "Kanade-san, you aren`t normal right now. We have to reform you."
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Tried to Prove That You Are Fine Just as You Are.
Ich wollte beweisen, dass du so gut bist, wie du bist.
Kimi ga Ari no Mama de Irareru Koto o Shoumei Shite Mita.
君がありのままでいられる事を証明してみた.
